long_description: Amazingly lightweight, waterproof and breathable, the women's Mammut MTR 201 Rainspeed Jacket is ideal for trail running when the weather's iffy. DRYtech(TM) 2.5-layer nylon is extremely light, robust and breathable, with a textured surface. Vents in back aid airflow. Close-fitting hood and adjustable hem seal out weather. Articulated elbows provide a natural fit and movement. Jacket stows in the inner pocket; has 1 zippered outer pocket on the side. Women's Mammut MTR 201 Rainspeed Jacket has reflective logos.
short_description: Amazingly lightweight, waterproof and breathable, the women's Mammut MTR 201 Rainspeed Jacket is ideal for trail running when the weather's iffy.
